alert.note: Alert for Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:16PM EDT until August 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southwestern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 516 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 19 miles west of Spartanburg to 4 miles east of Greenville Downtown to 15 miles northeast of Anderson, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Greenville Eastside, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Woodruff and Duncan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
